channel.title: Comments on: On Meeting With Experts and Searching for Library Services

item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/06/01/on-meeting-with-experts-and-searching-for-library-services/#comment-562">Sarah McClung</a>.
"Specialized Consulting Services" is definitely not what you'd call user friendly. We promise you won't see it on the new site :-D
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sarah McClung.

“Specialized Consulting Services” is definitely not what you’d call user friendly. We promise you won’t see it on the new site ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Sarah McClung
item.dc:creator: Sarah McClung
item.description:
Love the suggested search terms- "men with a librarian" :-)
Why is the page title so wordy? "Specialized Consulting Services" seems like overkill to me. Meet with an expert, schedule an appointment, etc. seem way friendlier and to the point.
item.content:encoded:
Love the suggested search terms- “men with a librarian” ðŸ™‚

Why is the page title so wordy? “Specialized Consulting Services” seems like overkill to me. Meet with an expert, schedule an appointment, etc. seem way friendlier and to the point.
